recipesJson.name: Screwed Fruitbase
recipesJson.author: Screwdriver
recipesJson.description:
This base consists of Vanilla Bean Ice Cream (CAP) with Cream Fresh (FA) and Meringue (FA).  Strawberry (Ripe) (TPA) adds to the creamyness.
Rounding of with Super Sweet (CAP).

So use a base like this that works for bright fruits (and more), add a simple layering for the topnote and sweeten as desired. 
DIY doesn't have to be complicated at all.

Anyone else care to share a base?

Enjoy enjoy,
Screwdriver

reviews.text: Looks good will have to try this with some fruits
